amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the funding level for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives by five percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 105 printed in House Report 115-297 to reduce the funding level for the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives by five percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A106) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 313 (Roll no. 494).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A106) Failed by recorded vote: 98 - 313 (Roll no. 494).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A106) offered by Mr. Grothman.
